title: Gold(en) promos
body:
What a great match up for my promos guys.
Not 1, not 2, BUT 3 AFKS. in the last loss. 
1 of them a repeat offender from the previous game. 

But nothing wrong with match making right?

replies.body:
Don't you get sick of repeating the same message time after time? 

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Exarch+Leona

You don't seem to include all those victories, but all of a sudden one lost = doom day scenario.
